name: Lost Lights
description:
Two best friends named Candle and Flashlight fall down a somewhat endless void on the top of a mountain, and thus causing them to start at the bottom of a dungeon!

Journey with two light sources as they continuously pass through floors of dungeons on their expedition to the top! 

Lost Lights is a unique adaptation of combining both dungeon and puzzle, while at the same time creating an additional game aspect of light mechanic and character management.

Will be available for purchase when finished.
